name: Yearning
desc: Collei's specialty. Nutrient-rich ingredients have been stuffed inside the soft pastry shell to create a filling dish fit for those on the move. According to Collei, the cutlet in it is named "Forest Rangers' barbecue!" ... You know, this rather reminds you of a certain enthusiastic girl in red. The dish must be the embodiment of Collei's innermost admiration.

customize.name: Recipe: Pita Pocket
customize.desc: A handwritten Pita Pocket recipe, with detailed cooking tips in small letters. The writer's penmanship seems questionable. Some letters are shaky, perhaps due to the bad condition she was in. However, every word was written carefully. If you learned how to cook it, don't forget to enjoy this delicious food together with her the next time you visit Gandharva Ville.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Flour
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Tomato
customize.desc: A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the "fruit or vegetable" debate is still going...

customize.name: Milk
customize.desc: Sweet and fragrant cow's milk. Don't waste a single drop, not even that one rolling down your chin.

customize.name: Pita Pocket
customize.desc: A bread with varied fillings. The flat dough has puffed up in the oven, reminding you of a lovely Pufferfish. The bread is usually cut in the middle into two separate "pockets," hence the name, "Pita Pocket." It is said that people of Sumeru used to dip the bread in sauce. But nowadays, people usually stuff the "pockets" with different fillings and then take big mouthfuls.

customize.name: Collei
customize.desc: A trainee ranger active in Avidya Forest. Behind her enthusiastic words and actions hides a slightly introverted personality.

value.text: Restores 40% of Max HP and an additional 2,350 HP to the selected character.
